name: Zahraaa
wishText: I hope your thesis goes well and you can graduate soon. I'm waiting in November :)
textInChatBox: Selamat ulang tahun! Semoga panjang umur, blablabla...
text2: That's what I was going to do
text3: But it's too boring and I don't like it
text4: So, I wanted to do something IT-er and a bit more
text5Content: You are a little bit special
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
